channel.title: Installation on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Upgrade module
item.description: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Upgrade module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_themecusto The module page list should be displayed and Theme Customization module should be displayed on the list Click on “Upgrade” button at the right of the module A modal is open with: * Title: “Are you sure you want to upgrade this module?

item.title: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Uninstall/Install module
item.description: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Uninstall/Install module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_themecusto The module page list should be displayed and Theme Customization module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Uninstall” option A modal is open with:

item.title: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Uninstall and delete module
item.description: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Uninstall and delete module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_themecusto The module page list should be displayed and Theme Customization module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Uninstall” option A modal is open with:

item.title: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Reset module
item.description: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Reset module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_themecusto The module page list should be displayed and Theme Customization module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Reset” option A modal is open with:

item.title: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Disable/Enable module
item.description: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Disable/Enable module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_themecusto The module page list should be displayed and Theme Customization module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Disable” option A modal is open with:

item.title: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Disable Mobile/Enable Mobile module
item.description: [Native] - Theme Customization module - Disable Mobile/Enable Mobile module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_themecusto The module page list should be displayed and Theme Customization module should be displayed on the list Click on “Disable Mobile” button at the right of the module * After loading, a green message “Disable mobile action on module ps_themecusto succeeded.
